name: Space Jam! Endless Runner
description:
HIGHEST SCORE WILL RECEIVE SOME UNITY SWAG MENTION ME ON TWITTER @CHLOEX3 OR INSTAGRAM @CHLOEMOONEY_GAMEDEVELOPER WITH YOUR SCORE AND USERNAME TO BE IN WITH A CHANCE !

Space Jam is an endless runner game where you play as an alien avoiding meteors!!

Made this game as a quick way to pass time, was made in a few days. might make updates to it!

#2D #2DGame #2DPixelArt #EndlessRunner #Unity #freetoplay #freecompetition #action #arcade #alien #scroller #upscroller #gamedev #scifi #retro #strategy #shooter #highscore
